snippet: As his country slid back into a recession, President François Hollande of France promised new measures to lower unemployment and coordinate economic policies in the euro zone.
abstract: French Pres Francoise Hollande, faced with deepening economic malaise and mounting public dissatisfaction with his leadership, promises new and aggressive measures to reduce unemployment and harmonize economic policies among countries using euro.

byline.contributor: Maïa de la Baume contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: As his country slid back into a recession, President François Hollande of France promised new measures to lower unemployment and coordinate economic policies in the euro zone.

headline.main: Hollande Vows Reform as Critics Grow Louder
headline.print_headline: As Critics Grow Louder, Hollande Vows Reform
